hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Abu Dharr though a different chain of narrators, but the former is more perfect. This version has:Mannan is the one takes account of anything he gives

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِسْبَالِ الإِزَارِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported Regarding Isbal With The Izar
